name: WineCooler
0:
”Alexa, ask Wine Cooler how to serve Chardonnay”
”What temperature do you drink red wine at?”
”How should I drink Pinot Gris?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wine cooler
des:
Find the ideal temperatures for serving different types of wine, with reds such as Pinot Noir and Cabernet Sauvignon, white wines like Chardonnay and Pinot Grigio, Champagne, ice wines, and more. Use Wine Cooler to ensure you bring out the best flavors and aromas in your next glass and enjoy the perfect balance of tannins to fruit and alcohol!

The misconception that red wine should be served at "room temperature" stems from the medieval days of castles and cellars, where chilly rooms never warmed up to modern levels. So next time you go to pour a wine, be sure to give it the proper chill first.

Temperatures are reported in Fahrenheit. Please drink responsibly.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
